response.original_title: Sacha Carlson and the Light: Drive You Like a Cadillac
response.overview: Set in a vibrant 1970s-era live studio variety show called Boogie Bus, a surprise cancellation during a commercial break leads to an unexpected musical guest stepping in: Sacha Carlson and the Light. Filled with infectious energy and funky choreography, he takes the stage and delivers a show-stopping performance of "Drive You Like a Cadillac," captivating everyone from the studio crew to viewers across the nation... nuns included.
response.title: Sacha Carlson and the Light: Drive You Like a Cadillac
